name: Parth Maheshwari

experience.title: Partnerships
experience.description: Hyperface is revolutionizing the way entities issue and consumers use credit cards. We work with banks to help them scale their credit card portfolio in a compliant and seamless manner and at the time provide a fantastic experience to the end consumer. I take care of bank and brand partnerships.

experience.title: Investment Professional
experience.description: Samyakth Capital is a fintech fund investing in pre seed and seed stage deals. Its portfolio companies include BharatPe, Dukaan, LiquiLoans, RentoMojo, Dukaan, etc. Responsibilities included sourcing and evaluating deals and portfolio management.
